website_summaries.verdict: A simple design made of responsibly-sourced materials that has earned more satisfied customers than complaints.
pros: Produces 10 years of dates in a self-inking stamp that is easy to use and produces clear images
Environmentally-conscious shoppers will appreciate that the plastic unit is made from 70% recycled materials
cons: Some owners complain about the date wheels being loose, making the numbers turn while using the stamp

customer_reviews.title: Good size, Poor Printing
customer_reviews.text: Two tone, blue and red ink Great! Good Size...Great! Printing... Extremely Poor :( Does not matter what the date is, the first day digit does not print unless you hold it in a certain position and if you are lucky. Unless my unit is defective, I would not recommend. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: George...

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change the date, works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to use - does what it should. Some reviewers had trouble changing the date but they may not have discovered that you can press down and then press the two red buttons, which will lock it in position so that you can easily change the date. Couldn't be simpler. You do have to slide the ink pad in when you get it - again, not very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Marine Supply

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - Open, Used, Package Damaged, Foreign Language
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived damaged, on it was a sticker from 'Amazon' stating product quality check. But the box was smashed - inside the larger shipping box. The language WAS NOT IN ENGLISH. It was used. Dials were difficult to turn and the font difficult to read. The item was in pieces, the plastic label shield was off and would not stay put when put back in place. There should have been an ink try in the box with it and there was not. BAD BAD BAD experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it each day heavily. It works and gives me a clean stamp. I give it a second or two to dry and it doesn’t smear. I haven’t had any issues with jamming, smearing, soft impressions, or failure to rotate. I’ve recommended this same one to two other people in my office. The ink cartridge is a standard slide in version. I’ve swapped it with different colors. I haven’t had any issues will blue and black. If you’re using red, you may want to clean it before use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Budget date stamp for the weekly paper pusher that gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I wish the ink was less smeary on plastics, but otherwise am pleased overall. Setting the date is a simple matter of turning it upside down, actuating the spring mechanism and dialing in the appropriate year, month and day on the tumblers. You must be capable of deciphering backward numerals, of course. The replaceable ink supply was literally a snap to install and arrived sealed to maximize its shelf life. I wouldn't expect this inexpensive unit to stand up to heavy, industrial usage, but for the household bill payer or short-term fudiciary this device ought to be more than suitable for years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great stamp
customer_reviews.text: Great stamp! I use it in my Moleskine sketchbook. The ink is not waterproof. Also the ink does not bleed through the page. You will need to get in with a q-tip and clean it once in a while. It seems to build up a little.
customer_reviews.author: Robert the Great

customer_reviews.title: Fine dater.
customer_reviews.text: Dependable dater which I use to date my mail. Also use it to stamp "paid" on the bills I file. BUT, I have one complaint concerning the location of the terms "received" and "paid," which are the two I use almost daily. They are not abutting each other, but are on opposing locations on the belt. That means each time I have to move the belt five positions to get from "received" to "paid," and it is not easy to do for my tender fingers. Sad to realize I will have to put up with it over 250 times a year. Hope the manufacturer reads this, but it won't help me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good tool POOR SET UP INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: I gave it only three stars because set up instructions on the box and here on the page were terrible. On this page it seems to assume that the ink is already in. Good set up instructions for setting the date but it took me looking at many user videos here to get the ink in after several tries. (and my hands covered in ink) So for those of us who are not mechanically inclined please IMPROVE THE DIRECTIONS TO LOAD THE INK TRAY FOR THE FIRST TIME. Thank you. Now that it is set up it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a great price
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing special, but does the job and the price is right. Mine came with the ink cartridge loose in the crumpled box, and the directions didn't say anything about these tabs on the side you have to snap off, as well as the top cover of the ink pad. But, got it installed, set the date, and what else to say... it works. I only need it a few times a week so not really concerned about whether the mechanism is particularly durable. You don't have to push it down fast or press hard. Nice, slow, gentle push and it makes a complete impression.
customer_reviews.author: Renard Dellafave

customer_reviews.title: Stamper works great; refills not so much
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the same stamper, first purchased in December 2015. The stamp pad that came with it was good for almost a year of pretty heavy use (close to 15,000 stamps before replacement). Each replacement pad has lasted less and less time. First one was about six months, second one about three months, last one about 2-3 weeks. At that rate, it is almost cheaper to buy a new stamper versus the replacement pads. The stamper itself does have some issues if it is not on a completely flat surface--even a few sheets of paper halfway under what you're stamping can give a partial stamp. For the price, it is worth the other minor issues.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for the office!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a self inking RECEIVED date stamp for work since my previous stamp didn't go past 12/31/2015. I got this one and absolutely love it!!! I really like how there's a line BY:__________ for initials so my boss can initial the bills as she reviews them. The wording received is in blue as well as the BY:____ and the date is in red. I really like that these are 2 different colors and stand out for easier sorting. The stamp is just the right size for what I need it for. If you are looking for a self inking received date stamp then this is the one. When this one ends 12/31/2020 I will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: M. Borell

customer_reviews.title: Date Stamp - Simple, Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple self-inking date stamp. It serves one function and one function only. It is simple, easy to change the dates, and very effective. The impressions are clear and it is very easy to use. It self-closes every time so there is no danger of getting ink on something unintended. This is not fancy, does not do multiple functions, but is very inexpensive. If you're looking for a date stamp and a date stamp only, this is the product to buy!
customer_reviews.author: old fashioned

customer_reviews.title: Good luck figuring out what stamp will get inked
customer_reviews.text: This is a real pain to use. Trying to figure out what date will come out is a headache as you need to read it backward while you set everything and once it is inked the words and numbers are difficult to read. Also, each time you set it be prepared for your fingers to be covered in ink as the gears to turn it are difficult and right against the stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Bstephens

customer_reviews.title: This is great, but I wish the manufacture could make this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great, but I wish the manufacture could make this product so that you can change the date from the top without having to turn it over, press it down and ink on your fingers...otherwise, since I don't use it everyday, its perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Missing ink cartridge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stamp as an add-on purchase. The stamp came without the ink cartridge so now I have to order one separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy ink pad
customer_reviews.text: I understand why the ink pad does not come pre-installed, but I found the learning curve to install it a bit messy and the instructions in umpteen languages thoroughly unhelpful (I figured it out from the picture on the seller's main page). If I were to do it again I would not have that insertion problem, but who knows when that might be. Overall I'm pleased with the purchase and the quality of the ink impression.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur Sachs

customer_reviews.title: TWENTY YEARS USING A TRODAT PRINTY STAMPER !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced the old one spanning 2009-2019. Purchased my first Trodat Printy 4820 stamper in 1999! They last 10 YEARS, have a refillable pad, are reliable, and work GREAT! I date-stamp just about all paperwork that I scan and keep! I even stamp my checks on the "date" line, so I know I issued it! Would NOT be without one! Can't beat Amazon's price either ($7.04). I have seen other vendors price these for as much as $19.95!!!
customer_reviews.author: HappyUser

customer_reviews.title: Ink lasted less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I usually love the Trodat stamp products, but this one was a serious disappointment. We got it at the end of January and by mid-April (less that 3 months!) it was already out of ink. Same usage that we've used for all of other date stamps, but they are still going strong in the ink department.
customer_reviews.author: soccertina

customer_reviews.title: Not great- worth the cost but spending more will get you better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best- at least for me. text is pretty small- like think of maybe 9-11pt font size, and depending on message word, even smaller. As others have pointed out the dials are not dials as much as rotating the belts and are difficult to change. Ink is light. A bit disappointing overall. Spend a little more and get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Hairy Tales

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to an "at home library" for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as part of an "at home library kit" for my girlfriend for christmas. It goes from 2018-2028. It didnt come with instructions but it was very easy to figure out nonetheless. Make sure you stamp on a hard flat surface in order to get the best stamp possible. $5 was a great price for this handy little stamp, I believe it will be the perfect addition to the gift, it makes it that much more authentic like a library.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hite

customer_reviews.title: Poor impressions
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying trodat stamps for years. They've always been superior quality. HOWEVER, these last x2 stamps that I ordered must be seconds or something. they both leave poor impressions. I've added ink to no avail. Don't waste your money on these. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Very clear printing.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST date stamp for current dates for the price. I love it so much I bought 3!!! One for work and home and an extra. Refills replacement are easy to manage. Ink levels are good for the price of the ink. The date set up does take some string used to. I prefer to turn it upside down and press it as if to stamp so that I can see what is coming up after the stamp flips to be sure the numbers are right.
customer_reviews.author: familyman

customer_reviews.title: Print size too small to be noticed, esp. only in black
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The stamp serves its purposes of allowing me to change the date daily, the year annually. Cons: The print size is quite small. I use the stamp on a document somewhat diagonally since the all-black image gets lost otherwise. I would not buy it again. I prefer the stamps that show a different color for the date.
customer_reviews.author: cpb

customer_reviews.title: Overall the construction is pretty good, image is clear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk because date stampers around the office just get up and walk away somehow. Overall the construction is pretty good, image is clear, and the ink is great! I only took off one star because the stamping surface doesn't always want to print the entire image. I have to wobble it around a little bit, but that's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: LEARN TO READ
customer_reviews.text: A Negative review because of the sarcasm of the seller. Product was fine. Delivery with instructions was totally ignored. Delayed my shipping and sellers response was “Maybe because of the Coronavirus “. Really?? Smart ass. Maybe illiterate drivers. If it was all that a day later Coronavirus is still going on.
customer_reviews.author: DBB ENTERPRISE

customer_reviews.title: Works just like you expect
customer_reviews.text: Works just like you expect, as well as the ones made 40 years ago of similar design, but no stamp pad needed. They are a bit sensitive to using on an irregular surface. Uneven or unstamped areas will be a problem if you are not on a flat surface, but not any worse than any other rubber stamp I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Little

customer_reviews.title: Only for regular paper stamping.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this thing is fine as long as there is not a coating of any kind on the surface you are stamping. I needed this for stamping the date received on my incoming supplies, but the labels apparently have some kind of light coating and aren't just normal porous paper. The stamp slides and the ink smears everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: No ink cartridge included
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Wish I had seen all the one star reviews claiming no ink cartridge. There seems to be a pattern here. I have to send it back which means I have to buy an envelope to send it in. Now I'm out an extra couple of bucks. I'll check the local Staples or something. :(
customer_reviews.author: CF 456

customer_reviews.title: lifeSAVER
customer_reviews.text: Compared to writing dates by hand, this stamp saves me a second or two. It doesn't sound significant, but I probably avoided getting carpel tunnel by 2021! It's quick and easy to use. The only downside is that changing the date can get messy. Great value for its price tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sif

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Date Stamper
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it is a date stamper. A rather sloppy stamper. I would prefer to use my own inkpad. I don't like the frame at the bottom, it hinders the stamping making the imprint smear and sloppy. Also hinders changing the date daily. I would return this stamper but cannot locate the simple stamper I had previously for the last decade.
customer_reviews.author: WP Diva

customer_reviews.title: Ink Pad Not included
customer_reviews.text: Excited to get this, but after changing the date to the current day, found out the ink pad had not been included in the box as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install the ink pad they gave me
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Easy to install the ink pad they gave me. And it comes up clearly first time around. If you are careful of switching with the wheels you would be fine without getting ink on your fingers (although a little ink doesn't hurt right??)
customer_reviews.author: Great Ingvar

customer_reviews.title: Ink splatters more than I remember
customer_reviews.text: Bought the cheapest one I could find at the time. Not sure if that was the greatest idea. The ink splatters more than I remember with these self inking stamps. It’s also every difficult not to get the ink on your hard when you roll the numbers. Works okay. Does what it’s supposed to. Just wish it was neater.
customer_reviews.author: S Preza

customer_reviews.title: Saves me time and frustration every day!
customer_reviews.text: I sign and date dozens of documents every day. Although my signature is the same every time, that pesky date keeps changing!!! There's like five new ones to memorize every freaking week!! Luckily, somebody figured out a way to not only keep track of the current date, but also mark the paper with the current date - all in the same tool!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Arrows indicate where the stamp will land
customer_reviews.text: Using a date stamp for paperwork can be difficult if you’re trying to stamp on a line. With other stamps, it’s hard to judge where the stamp will land on the paper. This stamp has two little arrows on the bottom that make it super easy to use! I’ve used other stamps that didn’t have the arrow indicators, and I swear they make all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Klp721

customer_reviews.title: Status and date don't work simultaneously.
customer_reviews.text: In theory this stamp would be great however when stamping with the status rubbers the date does not show up in the stamp. For example, I put the "faxed" rubber stamp in place (pushed it down really hard to make sure it's all the way in place) and when I push down the stamp only the "FAXED" shows without the date stamp (see video). I then have to remove the "faxed" rubber and stamp the date separately. Not only does this create extra work but my fingers get dirty every time... Unless I'm doing something wrong that I can't figure out or my specific stamp is faulty, this wan't designed very well...
customer_reviews.author: Benign

customer_reviews.title: Works create if you just need a date!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble (putting the ink pad in). I love that it has arrows on each side of the stamp area so you know exactly where the impression will be. Works great for me. I work with a lot of dates, so it comes in handy to stamp the date instead of writing the date repeatedly!
customer_reviews.author: ConnieW

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to set the date.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good buy. I wanted to stamp the date when students turned in late work to keep track of students' work, but this is not easy to set to the date. I have not even used it because it is more inconvenient to stop to see if I got the right date. Wish this had an easier way to set the date, rather than to always have to guess and check.
customer_reviews.author: Y Diaz

customer_reviews.title: A Cheap Date (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: Look, this is everything it said it was and it arrived quick. I'd call it a "great value" because, for a reasonably low price, my needs are met for my home office. I recommend it for your home office. It's well made and sturdy. In this price range I would have been happy with one color, but it's a two color stamp and it leaves a quality impression and when reading the stamped information its easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was easy to use and that I could change the date easily without getting ink on my fingers. It was pretty easy to install the ink pad. Just remember to press a little hard - with trial and error you can figure out how much pressure to apply during the stamping process.
customer_reviews.author: Iris L.

customer_reviews.title: NOT READY TO USE AFTER UNPACKING!
customer_reviews.text: Stamp does not come with an ink cartridge, although the picture on the website indicates that it does. After receiving my ink stamp, I had to get back onto the Amazon website and order an ink pad. This was very frustrating to me! The product otherwise would have received a better review from me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Awesome Stamping Action
customer_reviews.text: Great stamp my second one, I accidentally broke the first one myself otherwise I have no doubt that it would still be going. It's very versatile and stamps clearly. I use this in the office twice a month it last for 2-3 years without a refill. And when it's time to refill quick and easy. Perfect for any office administrator and who doesn't love the sound of a proper "STAMP"!
customer_reviews.author: Trex

customer_reviews.title: Nice date stamper, if not a little cheap-feeling.
customer_reviews.text: They're somewhat cheaply made, but they get the job done. I use it to date stamp requisition forms and other paperwork and I like how you can change the messages too. I have had no problems with changing the messages and date items. They don't easily glide but at just a little over $6, compared to the ones I've bought with only one message and costs over $20, they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Make your own stamp kit
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to find a stamp that was preassembled. I can't seem to get the template to lay flat and the stamp is uneven (i.e. year doesn't show up well, or one of the date numbers doesn't touch because "Received" is not even). Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It's what you'd expect from a self-inking date stamper; easy to change the dates, easy to get ink onto the stamp bits, can't complain. I also like that the part you put on the paper has little arrows to show where the stamp will go, so it can sit right between the lines. I didn't have any issues with ink getting on my hands or anything, and would order again if needed. Update: 6 months later, still works great. I was worried the ink would be dried out but it's doing just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Glad to see more years on this stamper.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the stamper, i thought it only had a few years on it because I had read reviews of people getting them when they were about to be out of date. I was glad to see it doesn't run out until 2029. All the stampers i have bought for my work has only had 5 years on them... Very worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Savitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi Stamp
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Not messy and simple to change the date and wording. Clear and readable print. The ink has yet to run out and I use it everyday on a weekly basis. Highly recommend if you need a good office stamp.
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Professional look stamp
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for work to help document dates instead of cramping my hand for transcription and validating paperwork. Definitely has a nice clean look when in use, no leaking out, and it's been about a year since I have been using my first one and it is lasting long. Highly recommended. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: it works, can be hard to turn to change the date. i purchased the 12 message stamp and the date only stamp. both can be very hard to turn. the 12 message stamp came with red ink cartridge and the date came with black ink cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: angela c.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Date goes till 2026 and back to 2016. Just make sure you pay attention and dont almost throw away the ink cartridge like I did. It is not assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Owen

customer_reviews.title: Hardy and Lasts
customer_reviews.text: I love using this date stamp for sketchbooks and journals. I’ve had this bad boy for over a year now and the ink is still as if it’s fresh! Just remember to lock it when you’re not using it, and keep it in a temperature controlled environment. This thing could last you a long time before you need another ink cartridge. Love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: If I had a use for more of these, I would buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this date stamp after having initially purchased. This one turned out to be cheaper, go figure. It's slightly bigger of a stamp, has larger turning wheels, so less ink on your fingers. It has a locking feature that allows you to see what will be stamped, which is nice. The alignment of this is far superior to the ExcelMark, in that it moves more easily and seems to seat itself on its own. For ease of use and less mess, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: william mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The stamp arrived on time and as described. Years on the stamp run from 2018 to 2029. The red buttons on the side are to hold the stamp facing out so you can see to change the date. The buttons will also hold the stamp slightly off of the pad so it can be removed or inserted. If you have trouble reading the date correctly as you change it, hold it up to a mirror and it will look correct. Alternatively, have some scrap paper available to test after you change the date until or unless you are comfortable reading the date as a mirror image.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, cover in ink
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy to use. I have never had so much ink all over my hands in my life. Also, almost impossible to know what dates you are actually setting it to. Zero map to show you the opposite sides after you set it. Just a horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Sierraimage

customer_reviews.title: Worse stamp
customer_reviews.text: The stamp pad was so hard to insert and everytime you try to stamp, the stamp pad and the rubber date roller keeps getting caught that it’s moving it and stamping the wrong dates! I ended up having severe ink all over my nails and hands! I tried washing it several time but it barely took off the ink. This is an awful product and waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: MCb

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as expected and its easy to adjust the date. I'm keeping this one in my office because the one in the mail room is never there when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could use if more often
customer_reviews.text: I used this to pre-mark forms with the date and I think it is very user friendly. Sometimes when I got close to the seam of a book the date didn't entirely stamp. It was failry easy to align the stamp and re-stamp.
customer_reviews.author: idkwat2namme

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I get ink on myself sometimes. I didn’t understand how to install the ink pad. It needs better instructions. I’m still not certain I did it right. It works but you occasionally end up with ink on your hand.
customer_reviews.author: MGK

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Says It Will Do
customer_reviews.text: This is a versatile stamp that is able to do what it advertises. At the same time, it should be noted that it is not easy to know what message is selected (other than by trial and error), and that the stamp can get somewhat messy, as the inking mechanism is not covered as fully as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for paperwork.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple self-inking date stamp for mounds of papers at work. This fits the bill! I would have liked it a tiny bit smaller with the characters closer together, but I'm so happy that I don't have to write the date a billion times. It's not hard to aim where you want the stamp to be.
customer_reviews.author: M&T Baker

customer_reviews.title: OK Stamp - Lacks instructions
customer_reviews.text: Without the video review posted at  I would have returned the stamp. The pictorials on the box are not good at all. Stamp works fine. I'd recommend the 4810 model as a better alternative. Happy stamping.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for the money, but it would be nice to put the simple directions in the box. So not to break it, had to find a U-Tube video to be sure I was putting in the ink stamp part correctly. Really!
customer_reviews.author: Terri L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and keeps me organized
customer_reviews.text: I got these after seeing them on a teacher site and I am in love with using it. Great because the students love to stamp their work when they are done and for once I’m entering the right dates in my grade book. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: I get a bit confused when I try to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: I get a bit confused when I try to assemble or disassemble this. I also have difficulty remembering which way to hold it in order to stamp things upright, but overall it works really well and I plan on buying another one if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jantec Neon Products

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Sturdy Stamper
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good, sturdy stamper to replace my old Xstamper No.1 which served me for many years. After (as usual) doing research, I decided to spring for this stamp. The stamp is bigger than my old XStamper and fits pretty solid in my hand. The impressions were messy and blurred, I had to turn the ink pad around and now it works pretty well. The red buttons on either side is to hold the the stamper in place while performing maintenance. It's pretty useless in my opinion. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Litmus

customer_reviews.title: Great stamp... if it happens to come with ink
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price... if it happens to come with ink. Other than that, it's a great stamp and was big enough to fit in the palm of a hand comfortably. But the box is very flimsy and I'm pretty sure the ink had fallen out of the box during packing.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: No instructions but not difficult to figure out
customer_reviews.text: No instructions for loading the ink pad but a bit of Googling was all I needed. Hard to see the labels for setting, but that's mostly about my weak eyes. All in all, I think the product is fine.
customer_reviews.author: hammock_monk

customer_reviews.title: Good design. Simple. Functional.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a huge time saver in a job where you are required to date many items you sign. I started with a signature block stamp, followed by a signature stamp, followed by this. I should easily expect it to save me minutes every day, hours every year. I'm very happy with it. One feature that this product had over others is the wheel that you use to turn the stamp. This wheel prevents you from getting your fingers covered in ink while changing the date. Good design. Simple. Functional.
customer_reviews.author: Crimson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to have one stamp to do multiple things. The ink cartridges are a little tricky of you don't line it up. Make sure you make good firm contact and don't just go quick. But for the price I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: M. LeClair

customer_reviews.title: Good stamp
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, easily installed ink, and am using daily. Nice strong stamping. Have used stamps regularly for jobs, so was accustomed with how to install the ink pad.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: The product itself works great and will definitely be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was quick to respond when i received the incorrect product! My issue was resolved professionally and quicker than anticipated. The product itself works great and will definitely be buying again! Only thing to keep in mind is how big the space is that you normally stamp because this stamp does take up quite a bit of space.
customer_reviews.author: LexsaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it a whole lot yet, but it's a great value for the price. I looked at other ones at the office supply store and they were easily three times the price. I just wanted something that could stamp a date of papers and it does that just fine. As others has stated, it doesn't come with directions but I figured out how to load the ink pad with the pictures provided on the box and setting the date is pretty straightforward. Assuming the ink pad lasts, I should be using this for quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should not complain because this item is low priced. But it really is junk. You really have to hold and press down just right or it binds up. The rubber stamp bands easily move left and right so make sure you have everything lined up for best performance. I doubt that it will last until 2026 - the latest year on the stamp, but I have only used it a small amount thus far. Cheap and cheap. Unfortunately I have not been able to find well made stamps online or at the big box stores in my city.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Tough to say too much about a self-inking stamp. It works exactly as it is supposed to work. There are dials that are spun to change the date, press down the stamp to view the current settings, then spin the dials to the correct date. The year stamp is not individual numbers, so this stamp does have an expiration date. The stamp uses a small red pad, inside a larger blue pad to ink the stamp, haven't had to re-ink it yet, but I don't see an issue in doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Utke

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Probably won't last forever, but definitely a great buy for the money. Just be careful when opening because the ink pad is tiny and you have to open it to put in the stamp. I ordered two and the ink pad fell out of the box and into the amazon shipping box for one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Esher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clear to read
customer_reviews.text: This stamp is very easy to use! Compared to the last stamp we had, this stamp is very clear and easy to read. The dates are easy to switch and stamp. This stamp is being used in a first grade classroom to date our writing work and seems to be easy to use with children and very durable. It is very nice to have the ink pad included and not have to use a separate ink pad. I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little date stamp
customer_reviews.text: We use this project in our home school as a passport stamp for when we visit each country. It works great and is easy to set. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: lbs

customer_reviews.title: Built for every day use
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a self-inking rubber stamp? Well, for starters it's a great value, sturdy, and built for every day use! If was one of those fellas that went around recommending a product, I'd probably recommend this one hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Item pictured is different than what was received. On ...
customer_reviews.text: Item pictured is different than what was received. On the printed part there is a "by line" which does not show in the picture. Wanted stamp with just the "Received and date". To much to return item, so will make do with what we got.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine came without an ink pad.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to sell a "self-inking" stamp pad without the INK! Stupid waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Suze B

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done-but expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to have around. We use them at my job to indicated when we receive paperwork. I don't use mine very often, I would say 3 stamps max a day and my ink is already getting low. I did not pay the current price for them. They have went up in price since I purchased them. I absolutely do not believe it is worth $46.99 for 2. That is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mae

customer_reviews.title: Nice Self Inking Stamp
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily at work and for as lightweight as it is I am surprised that it is still working. I'm pretty sure I've had this for about a year and it still going! In fact I dropped it twice today!
customer_reviews.author: Frynces

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made date Stamper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stamper to replace a 5-year old stamper that was "running out" after 2017. Starting using this a month ago. Date stamp is very clear and works easily. Seems like it will last until for years (it goes to 2027.) Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: PK1950

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: This stamp has been very useful in my categorizing my art work . A bit messy to set up at first but besides this it’s perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Very good stamp. Good size print for the date. Use it a lot during the work day saving me time instead of writing the date over and over and over.........
customer_reviews.author: Enr O

customer_reviews.title: Mine was missing the ink cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Missing ink cartridge from my "self-inking" date stamper. Researched question/ answers to find out if others came with the ink cartrige. They did. Tried calling customer support and got cut off. I just spent more $ on a replacement cartridge for one that was supposed to come with it. Otherwise the product seems like ok quality.
customer_reviews.author: Double Reed Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I use mine every day. Because it is made of plastic it is probably not going to last a long, long time. But I'm not sure that any company even makes a metal one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Paved With Gold

customer_reviews.title: It's a good stamp but it's 12 size
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I'm disappointed in the size. I already have this estimated 12 size font and I needed an 8 size font date stamp. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great for School
customer_reviews.text: Trodat Printy Economy Date Stamp I use this everyday to date my school papers. It is easy to read and the little rubber feet don't let the stamp smear when pressed on.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Chee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Just used it today on my invoices and it worked great. It comes with a lot of different choices of verbiage and 10years of yer date changes. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The stamped does the job. It could be better for the price point. Seems to be cheaply made. The impression could be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It was inexpensive and stamps the date on my products. Done. Will buy another when this one dies.
customer_reviews.author: Ski-ball

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stamp for a few months now, it's still going strong. It stamps the date nice and clear. Size is right for pretty much everything I do. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Newton

customer_reviews.title: Good stamp but not for mass impressions.
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy duty stamp, but for the price it’s of decent quality. Cannot mass stamp quickly, but it does the job. Very standard imprint.
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to change dates and stamp with ease. Great idea for grad photos if you need to date them for future!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hudgeons

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought anyway though the reviews were bad, I’m def pleased with it and use daily for work. The dials to change the date aren’t as sharp as other reviews said.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Very clean, self inking date stamp!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to stamp dates on the back of my toddler's art. I was worried without a lid that it might get messy, but it doesn't at all. When you use it, the stamp part flips around to expose the inked date to your document. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: What Day is It? You'll Know if You Own This Stamp!
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite bit of office equipment. Clear printing, easy adjustment, and a satisfying sound with every stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Liz LC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs, but does require test impression to fully ink
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% satisfied with this self-inking stamp. I think mine goes up to 2026, so lots of future use. One issue: if you change the date, you should do a few "test" stamps to make sure you get total ink coverage of the numerals and letters.
customer_reviews.author: Michael in Boston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very sharp stamp text.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for work, quick to switch the message from "received" to "checked" and to change the dates.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Renner

product_meta.title: Trodat Printy Economy Date Stamp, Self-Inking, Stamp Impression Size: 3/8 x 1-1/4 Inches, Black (E4820)
product_meta.description: Style:Date| Size:1-PackThe Trodat Printy is the best selling self-inking stamp in the world, and is used in offices, homes, and on the move. The Trodat Printy helps you reduce time with repetitive writing tasks, and lets you stamp your message, date, or any information you need to write over and over. For a quick, easy and economical way to stamp the date on your documents look no further than the Trodat Printy 4820. The Trodat Printy 4820 Date Stamp is small and compact, but don't let the size and lighter weight fool you: the Printy 4820 is a sturdy product that is built to last. Because the 4820 is a self-inking dater, it delivers rapid, repeat impressions that are perfect every time the stamp hits the paper. The Trodat Printy 4820 has easy to turn date bands with at least 10 current years in the standard format (MONTH-DAY-YEAR). The easy to change stamp pad will add to the life of your stamp, by giving you thousands of impressions before re-inking. Ink pads are available on Amazon. Stop writing out the date, and start stamping when you order your Trodat Printy 4820 Date Stamp today!
feature_bullets: Self-inking date stamp with at least 10 years of dates
Thousands of high quality impressions before changing the ink pad
Self-inking stamp with rapid, repeat impressions
See-through base allows for accurate stamping every time
Easy to change replacement ink pads available on Amazon
Climate neutral product with up to 70% post-consumer recycled content

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,024 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
